text: Bel décor. J'y ai été 2 fois. Bon restaurant pour déjeuner mais un peu plus dispendieux que la moyenne!

Modern resto. Young crowd. Music and chatter. Bright large windows. Lineup on weekends. Varied menu with many options. Not too traditional menu. Large portions and moderately priced. Good service from young staff. Potatoes have a little heat. Many types of coffees and juices. Popular with college crowd. Tasty well executed casserole dishes. French toast sandwich was dry. Ordered extra hollandais sauce which we got charged for. 
We will return.
Bon  restaurant pour déjeuner. Décor et atmosphère agréable. Nourriture bonne. J'ai demandé mon omelette baveuse et c'est ce que j'ai obtenu.
Very cute and clean restaurant, came here on our local friends suggestion. Great all day breakfast joint, and make sure you get here early to avoid the line ups as they don't take reservations.
